oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Hank Williams: Complete Works Volume 4
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: The recording is of a number of performances of Hank Williams Sr. (singer/songwriter). Tape is part of a collection labeled Hank Williams: Complete Works. Tape is labeled as part four of eight. The tapes were donated from the M.G.M. Studios collection.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Hank Williams
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) I Saw the Light (Hank Williams Sr.) -- (02:49) Calling You (Hank Williams Sr.) -- (05:47) Dear Brother (Hank Williams Sr.) -- (08:34) Wealth Won't Save Your Soul (Hank Williams Sr.) -- (11:23) I'm Gonna Sing (Hank Williams Sr.) -- (13:18) A Message to My Mother (Hank Williams Sr.) -- (16:07) How Can You Refuse Him Now (Hank Williams Sr.) -- (18:59) When God Comes and Gathers His Jewels (Hank Williams Sr.) -- (21:51) Jesus Remembered Me (Hank Williams Sr.) -- (24:46) House of Gold (Hank Williams Sr.) -- (27:16) Thank God (Hank Williams Sr.) -- (29:35) The Angel of Death (Hank Williams Sr.) -- (32:21) I Just Told Mamma Goodbye (Hank Williams Sr.) -- (35:19) Never Again (Hank Williams Sr.) -- (38:03) I Can't Get You Off My Mind (Hank Williams Sr.) -- (40:56) Fly Trouble (Hank Williams Sr.) -- (43:44) Dear John (Hank Williams Sr.) -- (46:23) Let's Turn Back the Years (Hank Williams Sr.) -- (48:54) I'm Sorry For You My Friend (Hank Williams Sr.) -- (51:41) I'll be a Bachelor 'Til I Die (Hank Williams Sr.) -- (54:20) I Can't Escape From You (Hank Williams Sr.) -- (56:47) I'd Still Want You(Hank Williams Sr.) -- (59:50) My Love For You Has Turned to Hate (Hank Williams Sr.) -- (1:02:35) My Son Calls Another Man Daddy (Hank Williams Sr.)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Williams, Hank, 1923-1953; Williams, Hank, 1923-1953. I saw the light;
